content.description: This climb goes up the right side of the arete that has Ego Terrorists on the left side of it. Climb suspect rock to the more solid rock above.
content.location: All the way at the end of the Wall of Dreams wall before the large boulder.

content.description: The leftmost route of two routes in this area. Climb slabby sandstone to the top.

The left side route of two routes that climb up an arete. The route on the right side of this arete is Ten 'Til Eight. These climbs are just to the left of "The Balcony". Climb suspect rock to the face above, where the rock becomes more solid.
content.location: Continue to the very end of Wall of dreams, and the routes are on the wall just before a large boulder that leads up to The Balcony.

content.description: Rarely climbed, and with awkward and discontinuous climbing, this isn't one of the New Side's best offerings.  Scramble up onto a boulder, clip the first bolt, then pull the steep varnished face above (crux).  After that, just thrash through the lichen on the slab above to reach the anchor.
content.protection: 5 bolts to a 2-bolt rap anchor.  Yes, a rap anchor!
content.location: At the far right end of the Balcony (really between the Balcony and the Open Face Wall) is this single boltline.  The climb starts on top of a large boulder.  Rap off the anchor; it's a pain to walk off from this one.

content.description: The right of two climbs in this area. Just as with Betty's Friend, climb the slabby rock to the anchors. A fun little route.
Decent slab climbing with enough runout to get your attention.  The line wanders quite a bit, and the rock is sandy, although solid.
content.protection: 3 bolts plus a bolted rap station at the top.
content.location: A good bit right of Purchase Agreement, past the wide, 4th class chimney.  The second line of bolts on the Upper Balcony.  Look for a blackish water streak and the pale, unvarnished face left of it.

content.description: As the rest of the New Side, north facing, this area gets sun in the afternoon to evening.
